1. The pre-processed metabolomics dataset and its associated meta-data if available (see section 4.1).
2. The defined process objectives.
3. The data exploration report, including: the results of data investigation, understanding and prospecting.
4. The selected data mining technique(s), as chosen and reported in the previous phase.
5. The requirements of the implementation of the selected technique(s), including: software tools, hardware, and expertise, modelling inputs format, parameters, and expected outputs, as well as their application constraints, including: time, cost, and expertise as well as the availability of the software and hardware infrastructure.
6. Background knowledge/information regarding the basics concepts of data processing in computing, including: databases, data types, data structures, file, and data format.
7. The process quality assurance policy.    
8. The process standards.
